actions.committee: House Committee on Education and Labor
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Education and Labor.

official_title: A bill to provide for the expansion of the Current Population Survey published by the Bureau of Labor Statistics so as to provide each State with monthly unemployment statistics.

summary.text: Directs the Bureau of Labor Statistics to expand the Current Population Survey so as to provide monthly to each State statistics on the number of unemployed persons within it.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the expansion of the Current Population Survey published by the Bureau of Labor Statistics so as to provide each State with monthly unemployment statistics.
